When you join #TeamAmex, you become part of a diverse community of over 60,000 colleagues, all with a common goal to deliver an exceptional customer experience every day.
 
Job Description
This position will focus on planning initiatives and execution under overall Consumer Lending strategy and marketing. Also, he or she will work with the Consumer Lending Marketing Manager to develop overall lending marketing strategy.
Consumer Lending is strategically positioned to grow triple from the current outstanding balance over the minimum term and this is an exciting career opportunity to drive business growth with large investment.
 
Responsibilities:

Plan and lead to execute/measure marketing programs to grow Consumer Lending portfolio
Develop marketing communications including DM, eDM, MYCA/Mobile App placements and track the performance/effectiveness to identify opportunities for improvement
Maintain existing Lending collaterals such as website, T&C, application forms, letters and emails
Collaborate with colleagues from the Central Lending team to introduce global lending capabilities and processes
Closely work with third party vendors to execute marketing programs
Analyze customer feedback and competitor activities to seek further opportunities
Manage ISL and MLL compliance as a business representative

 
Offer of employment with American Express is conditioned upon the successful completion of a background verification check, subject to applicable laws and regulations.
Qualifications:

Experience in product management or marketing
Good knowledge of Installment Sales Law and Money Lending Law
Proven team worker with experience working in cross-functional teams
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Strong communication skills and negotiation skills
Fluent in both business Japanese and English
Able to manage multiple tasks with good time management
